text: First things first... are you vegan or vegetarian?
If you were a kitchen appliance, which would you be?
Which one of these should be illegal?
options: Putting milk in the bowl before the cereal
Vaping right in front of my face

text: If you could switch lives with any cartoon character, which would it be?
options: Aang from Avatar: The Last Airbender

text: You arrive at the forest and see two paths. Which path do you take?
options: The rainbow path with glitter and sparkles
The cobbled narrow path with a candy trail
The blocks of logs with fiery roars heard in the background
The racing track with a go kart ready to zoom!

text: Which of the following would you rather have?
Which band name is the slayest?

options: Have toenails you could never cut
Have a bath with 10 slimy octopuses for 1 hour/week

text: What is your favourite beverage of choice at 9am in the morning?
options: Delicate, floral Chamomile and Ginger tea
A 1Litre bottle of Jack Daniels Whiskey
A classic Brown Sugar milk tea with tapioca
Raspbery & Passionfruit infused kombucha with chai
